title: Want to "go Pro"?? adc main. may fill
body:
Hi my name is David,im 16! im in bronze 2 and i do not rage!!!!
im a great team player and good listener and im willing to improve and learn  new plans through out my time with the team?. im a league player that wants to play in front of a roaring crowd one day.
i main adc- im very good with the following champions in this role,trist-cait-jinx-kog-corki and graves and kalista.
looking for a team, that is willing to play serious and take this as a life goal. so hit me up if your looking for a team player that is a quick learner and a great adc? please

replies.body:
word of advice.

Until you reach gold 3+ no one is likely to take it seriously, its the way this community is
gold 3+ is still trash, more like until plat 2+
I guess your right, had plats 5-3 in my last 10 games, they were all trashy. Only good plat I had was 2 (and I think someone drugged the Diamond 4)

> [{quoted}](name=Samurai Jin,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=0dAVJYGy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-05T03:04:57.286+0000)
>
> gold 3+ is still trash, more like until plat 2+

i'd say d3+
As Silver 5 with knowledge of the game since I watch and study off professional Summoners, While asking good questions I would say  Diamond 1 or above otherwise join a minor team.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=0dAVJYGy,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-05T08:50:03.388+0000)
>
> As Silver 5 with knowledge of the game since I watch and study off professional Summoners, While asking good questions I would say  Diamond 1 or above otherwise join a minor team.

ye

d3 is being too generous
d1/challengour is enough for a semi-decent ranked team

lets just settle it as, our Challenger is like a silver 3 in korea(and a gold 5 in NA), we all suck, we all lost hope long ago

The point of this post is...

KOREA IS BETTER THAN US ALL

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=0dAVJYGy,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-05T11:58:31.789+0000)

> lets just settle it as, our Challenger is like a silver 3 in korea(and a gold 5 in NA), we all suck, we all lost hope long ago
> 
> The point of this post is...

> KOREA IS BETTER THAN US ALL

but i think b5 na is worst than our b5
KOREA IS BETTER THAN US ALL
IDK I reckon if OCE had to verse NA I reckon we would win.
KOREA IS BETTER THAN US ALL
Your only hope is to become a Korean Challenger player. Sorry, but its true
